Title: Amal
Writer: Richie Mehta (screenplay), Shaun Mehta (screenplay), Shaun Mehta (short story "Amal: The Autorickshaw Wallah"), Rajesh Tailang (hindi dialogue)
Actors: Rupinder Nagra, Naseeruddin Shah, Seema Biswas, Koel Purie
Plot: When Amal impresses an eccentric millionaire with his humility and humanity, he unknowingly becomes the old man's beneficiary.
